name: Child of Eden
description: The Games on Demand version supports  English, French, Italian, German, Spanish.  One of the most anticipated games of 2011 for Kinect.  Winner of 9 awards at E3 for innovative graphics, music, and gameplay.  Child of Eden is the “multi-sensory shooter” that will send players diving into a visual matrix of synchronized music and mind-blowing visuals.  It will usher forth yet another landmark game experience from the mind of renowned game designer Tetsuya Mizuguchi.
